text: Terence William "Blondie" Chaplin (born 7 July 1951) is a South African singer-songwriter and guitarist. He played in the band The Flames in the mid- to late-1960s. He became known to international audiences in the early 1970s as a singer and guitarist for The Beach Boys. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:South African singers Category:South African writers Category:Singer-songwriters Category:Pop singers Category:Rock singers Category:Pop musicians Category:Blues musicians Category:Rock guitarists Category:South African guitarists Category:People from Durban
title: Blondie Chaplin
